name: Tanks for the Memories (SkruffiestMage)
description:
Tanks for the Memories is a basic top down tank shooter in which enemies spawn with increasing frequency each wave. Reach wave 13 to see the highest difficulty. The game features 3 different arenas of varying sizes

I am a college student, and Tanks for the Memories was created in the fall semester of 2020 as my first individual Unity project for an Introduction to Game Development course. I hope to expand on the game as my skills develop.

Controls: 

Mouse ..................................... Aim
Left Click / Left Ctrl ........... Shoot
W / S   or ▲ / ▼ ................... Move Forward/Back
A / D  or  ◄ / ► .................... Turn Left/Right
ESC / P ..................................... Pause

External assets used: 

Texture Pack Bricks 'n Blocks - Free on Unity asset store. Made by GlowFox Games
Casual Game Sounds - Free on Unity asset store. Made by Dustyroom. 
Barcade Font - Created by Dan Zadorozn
